Sentencas: The recent development of thin tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), microturbines and Stirling engines has inspired design studies of the integration of a SOFC-heat engine (HE) system within a car.
Titulo: Design studies of mobile applications with SOFC-heat engine modules

Sentencas: The total power system consists of a SOFC-HE power generation unit, a power storage (battery) system, a power management system and electric motors at the wheels.
Titulo: Design studies of mobile applications with SOFC-heat engine modules

Sentencas: The sizes of the HE and the SOFC stack are to be matched by the start-up requirements.
Titulo: Design studies of mobile applications with SOFC-heat engine modules

Sentencas: The use of micro tubes allows a very high power density of the stack.
Titulo: Design studies of mobile applications with SOFC-heat engine modules

Sentencas: The thermodynamic calculation of the cycle gives the actual design values for the study and indicates further steps for system optimisation.
Titulo: Design studies of mobile applications with SOFC-heat engine modules

Sentencas: The first SOFC-GT layout lead to an electric efficiency of 45% for the cycle used as a base for a design study [The Design of Stationary and Mobile SOFC-GT Systems, UECT, 2001].
Titulo: Design studies of mobile applications with SOFC-heat engine modules

Sentencas: The design study shows that the space available in a mid-class car allows the integration of such a system including space reserves.
Titulo: Design studies of mobile applications with SOFC-heat engine modules

Sentencas: A further improvement of the system might allow an electric efficiency of more than 55%.
Titulo: Design studies of mobile applications with SOFC-heat engine modules

Sentencas: The integration of a Stirling engine instead of the microturbine is a second possibility and the object of an ongoing study.
Titulo: Design studies of mobile applications with SOFC-heat engine modules

Sentencas: This was motivated by interesting results from the development of solar powered Stirling engines.
Titulo: Design studies of mobile applications with SOFC-heat engine modules

Sentencas: Generally, the analyses show that the optimal match of the SOFC and the HE will be a key issue for any engineering solution.
Titulo: Design studies of mobile applications with SOFC-heat engine modules
